website_summaries.verdict: A premium cleansing milk that does a good job moisturizing and taking off makeup.
pros: Melts away long-wearing, mineral, and waterproof makeup as well as sunscreen
Skin feels soft, moisturized, and refreshed
After cleansing, it easily tissues off or rinses away with water
Best used as part of a multi-step system
cons: This product is ophthalmologist-tested, but some find that it irritates if it gets in the eyes

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I have used the balm version of Clinique's Take the Day Off and loved it! I thought I would give the cleansing milk a try. BIG MISTAKE. It does not, in fact, take the day off. It leaves a yucky film on my face and feels like its junking up my pores. Stick with the balm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to use because I am a guy but boxing and sweating has been taking a toll (clogged pores and blackheads). Consistent use has cleaned up my pores and my face is never dry. Easier than going to Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Laff

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My wife only uses this product. Must be good. Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Count on Clinique to always satisfy. Love it, no greasy feeling after use. Use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Pete

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this product, but unfortunately this time it arrived damaged. The top of the bottle had snapped off in transit and the entire contents had leaked into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best at taking off your face make-up
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best at taking off your face make-up. I only use a cleanser which doesn't get the make-up off like this does. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Studebaker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t remove makeup as well as advertised. When removing eye makeup causes burning even when washed off.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Greenwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite Clinque products. Glad to fnd it available online.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dye Janes

customer_reviews.title: I just happen to like Clinique.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this in the past, and will continue to use it. I just happen to like Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST CLEANSER EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST CLEANSER EVER!!! COMES OFF SMOOTH AS SILK! Once you use it, you will never go back to anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee G.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as well as the Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm. Stings my eyes when I use to remove eye makeup. I would save your money and purchase the balm instead. Doesn't seem to work well as a face cleanser either :(
customer_reviews.author: mindi

customer_reviews.title: Not the best clinique product
customer_reviews.text: It does an ok job removing makeup. I like their balm and wipes better. Also, don't get this stuff near your eyes!! Holy stuffings it burns
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Beall

customer_reviews.title: Product is excellant!
customer_reviews.text: My mother has been using this product for years. Everyone comments on her skin looking a lot younger than her actual years.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Will order again.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. I find it very kind to my skin. I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M. Leas

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for years and was glad to see online at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for makeup removal
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing to take off makeup. Not so comfortable for the eyes so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Boymomjes

customer_reviews.title: The consistency is nice BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this because it burned my eyes terribly. It sounded like a soothing option for removing mascara, but I definitely don't recommend it for removing eye makeup. I didn't expect that from a Clinique product. I'm just not a fan of this line, because I exchanged this for the formula specifically for removing eye makeup and it caused some of my lashes to fall out, so this line just isn't for me and I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanJan

customer_reviews.title: Burns eyes terribly
customer_reviews.text: OW!! I usually use this stuff but in oil form. My local makeup counter was out so I bought this one. She said it wouldn't burn my eyes. This burns the crap out of my eyes!!!! The oil did not at all. So I'll be giving this away going back to the oil
customer_reviews.author: ckb

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My all time fav! My friend didn’t like it and game it to me and I’m Obsessed!!! Takes my make up right off!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Clinc
customer_reviews.text: Great product I usually buy it in s department store
customer_reviews.author: Deborah
